thread.title: Black Stars management committee chief impressed with debutants ahead of Canada friendly
thread.title_full: Black Stars management committee chief impressed with debutants ahead of Canada friendly

title: Black Stars management committee chief impressed with debutants ahead of Canada friendly
text:
15:10 CET Black Stars management committee chief impressed with debutants ahead of Canada friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com Phil Ofosu Ayeh is one of the debutants of the Black Stars team 
Black Stars management committee chairman George Afriyie says he has been impressed with the performance of the newly invited players into the team ahead of the international friendly against Canada. 
Ghana will be facing the Canadians in a warm up match in Washington on Tuesday in preparation of its 2018 World Cup qualifier next month. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us IF A BUTTERFLY THINKS IT'S A BIRD IT ENDS UP IN THE STOMACH OF A BIRD. By: FRANCIS TAWIAH , Du
